content: **errata** ds is not listed in the abbreviations ds stands for double stitch for the german short row method yarn the gram and yardage estimates are based on the on the single strand of mohair version with short sleeves pink and the double strand of suri with long sleeves white if you lengthen the body or sleeves you may need more yarn than what is listed **short sleeve version made with one strand of mohair pink ** * estimated yardage required 309 349 385 421 457 495 534 573 613 652 691 * finished garment measurements inches 33 37 41 45 49 53 57 61 65 69 73 **long sleeve version made with 2 strands of suri held together white ** * estimated yardage required 1 040 1 179 1 288 1 392 1 496 1 634 1 767 1 906 2 039 2 207 2 340 * finished garment measurements inches 37 42 47 51 55 60 64 69 73 78 82 i ve made this pattern multiple times playing around with the yarn used each time the first was with a single strand of mohair then suri held double and even a single strand a fingering
